scripts.deploy:local: pnpm --filter 'world' deploy:local && pnpm --filter 'experience' run deploy && pnpm --filter 'scripts' setupSpawn
scripts.deploy:testnet: NODE_ENV=testnet pnpm --filter 'world' deploy:testnet && pnpm --filter 'experience' run deploy && pnpm --filter 'scripts' setupSpawn
scripts.deploy:mainnet: NODE_ENV=mainnet pnpm --filter 'world' deploy:mainnet && pnpm --filter 'experience' run deploy && pnpm --filter 'scripts' setupSpawn
scripts.mud:up: pnpm mud set-version --tag main && pnpm install
